description.value: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is made of smoke. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is submerged in water, trapped in an airtight container, covered with a large lid, or blown by a strong wind, it takes 10 damage, which cannot be reduced in any way. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is reduced to 0 hit points in this way, it does not use its @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-creatures.Actor.LM3XXXtJ2LxuaW8D.Item.mmDeathBurst0000]{death burst}.
